content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
BLOWN AWAY. Was working in Ktown and came upon this gem. I've been a Korean food fanatic for over 20 years and eaten at many spots here in Ktown and all over LA. Can't believe I never came upon this authentic "Mom n' Pop" spot. Sundubu is amazing, Bibimbap is legit, banchan is on point, authenticity and charm makes this place perfect. AND so many other items on the menu that look enticing.The chef's son painted the walls with some beautiful Korean landscapes as well.Do yourself a favor: COME HERE!
